## class_SliderComponent
Defined in: [angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.component.ts:149](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.component.ts#L149)

SliderComponent is an Angular component that extends the BaseWidgetDirective
to provide a customizable slider widget. This component allows for various
configurations and customizations through its inputs and outputs.

### Properties

#### ariaLabelHandle

> `readonly` **ariaLabelHandle**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| (`value`, `sortedIndex`, `index`) => `string`\>

Defined in: [angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.component.ts:217](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.component.ts#L217)

Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute for the handle

##### Param

value of the handle

##### Param

index of the handle in the sorted list

##### Param

index of the handle in the original list

##### Default Value

```ts
(value: number) => '' + value
```

***

#### ariaValueText

> `readonly` **ariaValueText**: `InputSignal`\<`undefined` \| (`value`, `sortedIndex`, `index`) => `string`\>

```ts
(value: number) => '' + value
```

## interface_SliderContext
Defined in: angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.gen.ts:19

Represents the context for a Slider component.
This type is an alias for `WidgetSlotContext<SliderWidget>`.

### Extended by

- [`SliderSlotHandleContext`](#sliderslothandlecontext)
- [`SliderSlotLabelContext`](#sliderslotlabelcontext)

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: `object`

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:75](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L75)

all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`SliderDirectives`](#sliderdirectives)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:71](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L71)

directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<[`SliderWidget`](#sliderwidget)\>

Defined in: [angular/headless/src/types.ts:119](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/angular/headless/src/types.ts#L119)

The state of the widget. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

## interface_SliderSlotHandleContext
Defined in: angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.gen.ts:38

## class_SliderStructureDirective
Defined in: [angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.component.ts:78](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/angular/bootstrap/src/components/slider/slider.component.ts#L78)

Directive that provides structure for the slider component.

This directive uses a `TemplateRef` to handle the context of the slider slot.
